Room.Name: Ferocious Beast Cage
Room.ShortDescription: You have found yourself inside the displacer beast's cage.
Room.LongDescription: In the corner of the cage is a small bit of straw being used as a bed for the beast that is kept here. Outside of the cage you can see tigers and their tamers performing tricks. Fortunately, none of those tigers can get in here. Unfortunately, the beast that resides in this cage is far more deadly. At first, displacer beasts, as they are called, look like panthers with two tentacles springing out of their shoulders. Closer examination reveals a much more deadly trait. As the beasts move, their bodies shift dimensions, making them very difficult to focus on and hit. Maybe there is one stalking you right now...
